name: Blitz (itch) (Atruan)
description:
IMPORTANT! THE WEB BUILD HAS NOT BEEN TESTED AND I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THAT YOU DOWNLOAD THE 30MB

This game is set during the first nights of the London Blitz. You must take control of an anti-aircraft gun and shoot down formations of German bombers. If too many planes pass, you lose the game.

Made in 4 days for HAGJ5

CONTROLS

- Right-Click for zoom
